Traits.Name: Flying
Traits.Description: Ignores all terrain and terrain effects other than impassable terrain, and ignores engagement and obstruction.

Actions.Name: Spirit Away
Actions.Description: The Hob swaps places with a character in range 2, teleporting both. If either character cannot teleport, this move cannot be made.

Actions.Name: Dancing Light
Actions.Description: The Wisp summons a dancing light, an intangible size 1 summon in range 6 that cannot be placed adjacent to any character. When any non-hob character starts their turn adjacent to the light, it explodes in a blast 1 area effect centered on it. Characters inside must save or take 2[D] and become blinded, or [D] on a successful save.
